text: Rzepa () is a Polish surname. Turnip ==Meaning and origin== The name derives from rzepa, a Polish word meaning turnip.https://dictionary.cambridge.org/dictionary/polish-english/rzepa ==Notable people== Notable people with this name include: * Henry Rzepa (born 1950), British chemist * Miroslaw Rzepa (born 1968), Polish footballer ==See also== * Rzepka * Žepa ==References== Category:Polish-language surnames
title: Rzepa
